title: Fort Matanzas National Monument: Archive
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases     Archive                Archive           Subscribe  | What is RSS     March 08, 2016  Bird Walk at Fort Matanzas March 12 2016  The National Park Service is pleased to announce an opportunity to explore the ecology of Florida’s coast.   January 22, 2016  Cultural Influences in the Spanish Colonial Kitchen  Fort Matanzas National Monument will host a special free day event on Saturday, January 30, 2016, from 10:00 a.m. until 3:00 p.m. During this event reenactors dressed as Spanish colonial women will describe the life of a typical woman in Saint Augustine during the Spanish period.   January 20, 2016  Bird Walk at Fort Matanzas January 23, 2016  The National Park Service is pleased to announce an opportunity to explore the ecology of Florida’s coast. Join our volunteer Veronica Peterson, Saturday January 23, 2016 from 9:30 - 11:30 a.m. for an informative bird walk in the park’s diverse habitat.   January 07, 2016  Matanzas Torchlight Tours  Fort Matanzas National Monument will be offering evening Torchlight Tours on Saturday, January 23, 2016.   December 14, 2015  Bird Walk at Fort Matanzas on December 19, 2015  Bird Walk at Fort Matanzas on December 19, 2015   January 05, 2015  Torchlight Tours  Take a nighttime ferry ride to Fort Matanzas and visit Spanish soldiers from 1743!   January 02, 2015  Fort Matanzas Bird Walk  Explore Florida's coastal ecology during a two hour walk through the monument's diverse habitat.   December 08, 2014  Bird Walk at Fort Matanzas  The National Park Service is pleased to announce an opportunity to explore the ecology of Florida's coast.  Join our park volunteer Veronica Peterson, Saturday December 13, 2014 from 9:30-11:30am for an informative bird walk in the park’s diverse habitat.   September 04, 2014  New Chief of Interpretation Arrives  Steven J. Roberts, new Chief of Interpretation & Education, arrives at Castillo de San Marcos and Fort Matanzas National Monuments.   June 12, 2014  Final General Management Plan Released  The final version of the General Mangement Plan has been released.
